TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DocumentPaginator extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供支持从单个文档创建多页元素的抽象基类。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class that supports creation of multiple-page elements from a single document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要自动重新分页来响应事件（例如更改 的页面大小），请使用 作为基类。If you need automatic background repagination in response to events such as changing the page size of a , then use as your base class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重载可以取消此异步操作，而无需取消所有异步操作。This overload of the method makes it possible to cancel this asynchronous operation without cancelling all asynchronous operations. 此方法引发 事件。This method raises the event. 作为一个事件参数传递到事件。The is passed to the event as one of the event arguments. 以下步骤演示了如何异步检索 ：The following steps illustrate how to retrieve a asynchronously: 1. 创建 委托，并将其添加到 事件的通知。Create a delegate and add it to be notified of events. 2. 调用 指定所需 `pageNumber` 和唯一 `userState`，这将用于标识异步事件的完成。Call specifying the `pageNumber` desired and a unique `userState`, which will be used to identify the completion of the asynchronous event. 3. 当发生事件并且调用委托时，将比较事件的 。When the event occurs and the delegate is called, compare the event's . 具有原始 `userState` 参数的属性。property with the original `userState` parameter. （(The . 属性还将与 调用中指定的 `pageNumber` 匹配。）property will also match the `pageNumber` specified in the call.) 4. 当 。When the . 属性匹配原始 `userState`，操作已完成且页面已准备就绪。property matches the original `userState`, the operation is complete and the page is ready. 5. 调用 以检索格式化的 。Call to retrieve the formatted .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property PageCount As Integer
public: abstract property int PageCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，获取当前已设置格式的页数的计数。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a count of the number of pages currently formatted.

value.span: 已设置格式的页数的计数。

span.span: A count of the number of pages that have been formatted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `true`，分页将完成， 是文档中的总页数。If is `true`, pagination is complete and is the total number of pages in the document. 如果 `false`，则分页处于进程中， 为当前已设置格式的页数（而非总计）。If is `false`, pagination is in process and is the number of pages currently formatted (not the total). 如果 或内容发生更改，此值可能会改变，因为这些事件会强制重新分页。This value may change if or content changes, because those events would force a repagination.

summary.span: 在文档内容改变时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the document content is changed.
